{"id":890488144,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1675400842,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/890488144/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"42.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String convert(String s, int numRows) {\n    char[] charArr = s.toCharArray();\n    int len = charArr.length;\n    StringBuffer[] sb = new StringBuffer[numRows]; \n    for(int i=0;i<numRows;i++){\n        sb[i]=new StringBuffer();\n    }\n    int i=0;\n    while(i<len){\n        for(int index=0;index<numRows && i<len;index++){\n            sb[index].append(charArr[i++]);\n            \n        }\n        for(int index=numRows-2;index>=1 &&i<len;index--){\n            sb[index].append(charArr[i++]);\n        }\n    }    \n     for(int j=1;j<sb.length;j++){\n         sb[0].append(sb[j]);\n     }   \n      return sb[0].toString(); \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false}
